pageHeader.title: Our Medical Services
pageHeader.subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare services for your family

seo.title: Our Services - Unita Hospital
seo.description: Comprehensive medical services including emergency care, maternity, pediatrics, laboratory, pharmacy, and more at Unita Hospital, Ikotun, Lagos.

services.title: General Consultation
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive medical consultations for all ages
services.description: Comprehensive medical consultations for all ages. Our doctors provide thorough examinations and personalized treatment plans.

services.title: Emergency Services
services.shortDescription: 24/7 emergency care for urgent medical situations
services.description: 24/7 emergency care for urgent medical situations. Quick response and immediate medical attention when you need it most.

services.title: Maternity & Childbirth
services.shortDescription: Complete care from pregnancy through delivery
services.description: Complete maternity care from pregnancy through delivery. Safe, supportive environment for mothers and newborns.

services.title: Pediatric Care
services.shortDescription: Specialized healthcare for infants and children
services.description: Specialized healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents. Gentle, child-friendly medical services.

services.title: Laboratory Services
services.description: Comprehensive diagnostic testing and analysis. Fast, accurate results for informed medical decisions.

services.title: Pharmacy
services.shortDescription: Fully stocked pharmacy with essential medications
services.description: Fully stocked pharmacy with essential medications. Convenient access to prescribed and over-the-counter medicines.

services.title: Minor & Major Surgery
services.description: Safe and professional surgical procedures in a sterile environment with experienced medical staff.

services.title: Antenatal Care
services.description: Comprehensive prenatal care and monitoring. Regular checkups to ensure healthy pregnancy and development.

services.title: Postnatal Care
services.description: Post-delivery care for mothers and babies. Support for recovery and newborn health monitoring.

services.title: Vaccinations
services.description: Essential immunizations for children and adults. Protect your family with recommended vaccines.

services.title: Health Screenings
services.description: Preventive health assessments and early disease detection. Regular screenings for optimal health maintenance.

services.title: Family Planning & Contraception
services.description: Counseling and services for family planning decisions. Professional guidance on reproductive health.

extendedServices.title: Extended Services Through Our Partners
extendedServices.description: In addition to our in-house services, we provide access to specialized care through trusted partners:

items.title: Laboratory Services
items.description: Comprehensive diagnostic testing via Biochem Laboratories

items.title: Dental Care
items.description: Professional dental services through our dental partner
